DataElement.preferredName: Past 12 Month Alcoholic Beverage Quantity Five Or More Daily Use Alcohol Consumption Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value that represents on how many days, in the past 12 months, a person had 5 or more drinks of any alcoholic beverage.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Past 12 Month Alcoholic Beverage Quantity Five Or More Daily Use
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Before the present time._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::12_One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._A drink, including beer, wine or liquor, that is made by fermentation of raw materials. An alcoholic beverage contains ethanol (alcohol) as the active ingredient._How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number._A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Greater in size, amount, extent, or degree._Occurring or done each day._A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.:A number with no fractional part.::12:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:A drink, including beer, wine or liquor, that is made by fermentation of raw materials. An alcoholic beverage contains ethanol (alcohol) as the active ingredient. Alcoholic beverage is a known human carcinogen.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
A drink, including beer, wine or liquor, that is made by fermentation of raw materials. An alcoholic beverage contains ethanol (alcohol) as the active ingredient.

Property.preferredName: Quantity Five Or More Daily Use
Property.preferredDefinition: How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.:A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Greater in size, amount, extent, or degree.:Occurring or done each day.:A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

Concepts.definition: How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.
A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Greater in size, amount, extent, or degree.
A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The average number of alcoholic drinks consumed by the participant.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A symbol or string of symbols expressing value, quantity, or identification. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP Instruction
ReferenceDocuments.description: Enter a whole number (i.e. "4") only. Do not enter a range or fraction.

ReferenceDocuments.name: In the past 12 months, on how
ReferenceDocuments.description: In the past 12 months, on how many days did you have 5 or more drinks of any alcoholic beverage?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Enter the number of days you had 5 or more drinks, or enter 0 if none

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-2
ReferenceDocuments.description: In the past 12 months, on how many days did you have 5 or more drinks of any alcoholic beverage?  Enter the number of days you had 5 or more drinks, or enter 0 if none.

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-3
ReferenceDocuments.description: In the past 12 months, on how many days did you have 5 or more drinks of any alcoholic beverage?  (Enter the number of days you had 5 or more drinks, or enter 0 if none.)
